cab.content:
Colonel W. Dally Jones. (This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
G.T. 4926
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 22nd JUNE, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
The Situation is unchanged.
2. ITALIAN FRONT.
No further news have been received since to-day's noon Battle Situation was issued.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
22nd June, 1918.
Issued at 6.20 p.m.
